REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT

Title: Requires certain handicap accessible playground equipment in each playground within each state park
Summary: Requires at least one handicap accessible swing set in each state park.
LawCode: Add ยง79-r, Civ Rts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law, in relation to requiring certain handicap accessible playground equipment for children with disabilities
